meta_title: SWMS Template for Maintenance: The 2026 Guide to HRCW Compliance
meta_description: Download a comprehensive SWMS template for maintenance work. Learn to digitize safety workflows, manage High Risk Construction Work (HRCW), and reduce
title: SWMS Template for Maintenance Work: Moving Beyond "Tick and Flick" Compliance

hero_image.alt: Hero image for SWMS Template for Maintenance Work: Moving Beyond "Tick and Flick" Compliance

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-quality image set in a modern industrial manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance technicians (men and women) are gathered for a safety briefing. They are wearing full PPE including hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. One technician is holding a rugged tablet, showing the back of the device, while pointing to a piece of large machinery (like a conveyor or compressor) in the background. The lighting is bright and professional, emphasizing a clean, safety-conscious environment. No text or overlays in the image. The atmosphere is collaborative and focused.
